text: Grêmio Foot-Ball Porto Alegrense is a football club which plays in Brazil. == League title == * World championship : 1 ** 1983 * Copa Libertadores da América : 3 ** 1983 ** 1995 ** 2017 * Série A : 2 ** 1981, 1996 * Copa do Brasil : 5 ** 1989, 1994, 1997, 2001, 2016 Category:Brazilian football clubs Category:Porto Alegre Category:1903 establishments in South America Category:1900s establishments in Brazil
title: Grêmio Foot-Ball Porto Alegrense
